rooms.description: Entrance area with reception desk and corridor leading to living areas.
Open space with floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample natural light and views. Vastu compliant orientation for prosperity.
Adjacent to the kitchen area, ensuring smooth flow of energy as per Vastu guidelines.
Privacy ensured with separate access; includes built-in closet and an ensuite bathroom.
Additional bedroom for guests or family member. Positioned according to Vastu principles for balance.
Functional and efficient design with Vastu alignment.

openings.description: Main entry point designed for secure access.
Floor-to-ceiling windows enhancing natural light and ventilation.
Floor-to-ceiling windows offering privacy with Vastu compliant orientation.

rooms.description: Dedicated space for fitness with ample ventilation and natural light through Vastu aligned openings.
Roof-top terrace offering panoramic views. Designed in compliance with local building norms and Vastu guidelines to provide balance and harmony.
Optional room for expansion or relaxation; designed with natural lighting and proper ventilation.

openings.description: Spiral staircase ensuring efficient use of space and adherence to building norms.
Access door from the gym to terrace for fresh air and outdoor view.
